title: NFL Preseason Week 3 Recap: Ravens lose JK Dobbins, Jaguars trade Gardner Minshew, 49ers keep experimenting with 2 quarterbacks, Josh Allen looks phenomenal (Football 8/30)
description:
Visit budlight.com/delivery to get your limited edition Bud Light team cans.

Next stop: the 2021 NFL regular season. That's right, we've made it through the preseason, but before we totally turn our eyes to September, Will Brinson is joined by Tyler Sullivan to recap Week 3 of the season prior to the season. The guys discuss the 49ers plan at quarterback and experimentation with a 2-QB system featuring Jimmy Garoppolo and Trey Lance (4:00). They also focus on how excellent Josh Allen looks and why it's wise to get some money in on his MVP odds right now (10:30). Brinson and Sully evaluate Jordan Love's performance (16:45), take notice of stellar play from Patrick Mahomes even when the games don't count (19:00) and react to the Ravens losing JK Dobbins for the year (23:00). The Bears QB situation has been a hot topic of the preseason and that debate will likely rage on into the actual regular season (29:00). Will and Tyler equally agree that Urban Meyer is mishandling things in Jacksonville when it comes to QB1 Trevor Lawrence and with the trade of backup Gardner Minshew (35:00). Finally, the guys dish out winners & losers from the weekend (47:00). 

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Read the Pick Six newsletter here: https://www.cbssports.com/newsletters/picksix/
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
